because a reporter has enormous power to
hurt
people and uh the best example I can

one of one of the favorite stories that

black part

hundred thousand uh people organized in

about were called the Weis sorts and
they lived in southern
Maryland uh and uh and they had never
been able like most tri-racial isolate

many of these communities the mungan in

comes from an expression that we sorts
of people are different than you sorts

amazing
Community uh and
uh and little did I think that the
children would be ostracized in school
because they share their six Core last
names there's a lot of in marriage and
children of these six core families were
really ostracized in school and it
really made me think as as a number of
other I think more than anything I

have the power to to hurt someone and

give people an opportunity to say hey is
